entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
